Text: Why did you change file format to MP4? Sadly my network player doesn't like MP4's... Any chance of changing back to AVI?
Both Quicktime and VLC were unable to open it. Never had any problems before with eztv.
Same as BFNC2, can you go back to avi as xbox doesnt recognize these types.

This is the second week in a row that Parks and Rec .mp4 has been completely unwatchable due to bad compression effects, I watch in VLC and I've not had this problem before with any other x264 videos.
Works and looks great on my PC with GOM player. Thanks eztv!!
MP4 is awesome for PS3 and mobile devices; quit bitching.
And it worked for me in both quicktime and VLC, with what seems like slightly better quality than .avi files of similar size.
Thank you for finally thinking of the ps3 users!! MP4 works great
Shcwit, I'm glad the change makes it better for you, but the change had the opposite effect on me. I hardly think that makes my comment "bitching"
